root: ^"I get the things ready and we can start fixing your spine pain."
^"Will you lie on that operating table over there?"
^Knowing that he bags the parts he cuts off from the patients to "make use", I cannot be more afraid to turn my back to him with a knife.
^"Actually, I- I think it's fine not to do it today."
^"I changed my mind-- you see, it's already late, and it's not hurting that much."
^"But I've got all the things ready."
^"Plus it will be really quick. I told you--not very longer than 30 minutes and everything will be fine."
^I bet he said the same thing to his other patients. No wonder there are so few negative comments about this place.
^"Well, I just don't want to do it today."
^For a moment he is speechless. He keeps staring right into my face. I suddenly realized that, if he thinks it is necessary not to let me leave this room, he has plenty of ways to do that.
^Does he think I saw what they were doing? Does he know?
^"I- Actually I need to do things later soon, so--"
^At this moment I wish I chose to go to the dinner with my supervisor. Or maybe I should have went home. I wish that I never came here.
^"I'm talking about what you heard. Thinking about it, you must have heard the business we are doing, isn't it?"
^"It would be strange if you didn't. We were just outside this door afterall."
^I need help. I need to get away from here. The clinic assistants, will they help me out? Will the police come if something happens?
^"P-Please. I won't say a word. Please, let me leave. I'll keep my mouth shut, I swear."
^"Oh--no. Don't you really believe I'll let you go with that?"
^"Anyways, I didn't intend to do so in the first place, from the beginning."
